docs.lead_paragraph: The White House has lost its pastry chef, the Waldorf-Astoria has lost its Iranian restaurant and France has lost its snail-eating champion.

docs.lead_paragraph: GOVERNOR BYRNE has persuaded Dr. Joanne E. Finley, the state's Commissioner of Health, to do something that even her husband and children could not get her to do: cut down her smoking.

headline.main: Antismoking Law Upset as Misleading and Ineffective; Harmful Effects Amblent

docs.abstract: Va Supreme Court throws out Newport News antismoking ordinance on ground that although people in open can be segregated, smoke cannot; Justice Richard H Poff, who wrote opinion, says city has right to enact bans against smoking in public places only in reasonable manner (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: RICKMOND, Nov. 23 (AP) The Virginia Supreme Court has thrown out a Newport News antismoking ordinance on the ground that although people in an open room can be segregated, smoke cannot.
docs.snippet: RICKMOND, Nov. 23 (AP) The Virginia Supreme Court has thrown out a Newport News antismoking ordinance on the ground that although people in an open room can be segregated, smoke cannot.
